Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars.  Beat in egg, orange juice and peel.  Combine flour, baking soda and salt;  gradually add to creamed mixture.  Stir in pecans.  Shape dough into two 11-1/2-in. rolls; wrap in plastic wrap.  Chill for 4 hours or overnight.
Unwrap; cut into 1/4-in. slices.  Place 2 in. apart on lightly greased baking sheet.  Bake at 400 degrees F for 7-8 minutes or until golden brown.  Remove to wire racks to cool.
